org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.processor.impl

Interface ElasticsearchWorkOrchestrator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BarrierElasticsearchWorkOrchestrator

    public interface ElasticsearchWorkOrchestrator
    Aggregates works from changesets, orchestrates their execution and runs them asynchronously.
    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere
